effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

flavor_text.sword_shield: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
